meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a fish in the family Labridae.
meanings.sent1: The labroid colors of the fish made it stand out in the aquarium.
meanings.sent2: The labroid markings on the fish helped it blend in with the coral reef.
meanings.sent3: The labroid fish decided to wear a tiny top hat for a formal underwater event.
meanings.sent4: Her labroid personality shone brightly in a sea of conformity.
meanings.sent5: The labroid appearance of the creature was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A fish in the family Labridae.
meanings.sent1: The labroid swam gracefully among the seaweed.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a colorful labroid while snorkeling near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The labroid fish told jokes to the other sea creatures, making them all laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, the labroid was a jewel among the fish.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium were mesmerized by the labroid's beauty.
